link.title: Student Meals During School Closure | Campbell Union School District

button.class: navbar-toggle pull-left btn search btn-default btn-cusd-text

div.strong: All schools are closed through June 11th, 2020. More on our COVID-19 Resources page.

div.p: During the schools closure, our District will be offering free grab-and-go meals, at the sites listed below from 11:00am to 12:00pm, Monday through Friday.

Meals available for pick-up are free to all children, 18 years of age and younger. Any child from any school can participate. Children do not have to be present for parents or caregivers pick up their meals.
We will offer a pre-packaged lunch and a pre-packaged breakfast for the following day.

ul.li: Blackford Elementary - 1970 Willow St. San Jose
Castlemont Elementary - 3040 E. Payne Ave. Campbell
Lynhaven Elementary - 881 S. Cypress Ave., San Jose
Rosemary Elementary - 401 W. Hamilton Ave. Campbell *
Sherman Oaks - 1800 Fruitdale Ave. San Jose *
Monroe Middle - 1055 S. Monroe St., San Jose

div.h3: * More meals for those in need!
div.br: Starting May 1st, these 3 schools—Capri, Sherman Oaks and Rosemary elementary—also will offer weekend meals every Friday. On Fridays, from 11 am-12 pm, families can pick up two-days-worth of student breakfast, lunch and dinner provisions, free of charge, thanks to the Santa Clara County Emergency Operations Center (EOC). Questions? Please contact Child Nutrition Services at (408) 341-7210 or e-mail at <http://www.privatedaddy.com/?q=QmQaFWVvCxhOaGwFRH0JKytUDgdyYzk5_713>.

div.p:
Campbell Union School District Office • 155 N Third Street Campbell, California 95008
8am–12:30pm & 1:30pm–4:30pm, M–F (except holidays) • (408) 364-4200 • <http://www.privatedaddy.com/?q=ZXgeLnB-2FKhZfZ3kLTWQWOnZfUg9USnJjOTk-3D_713> • More Info
Title IX • Uniform Complaints • Report Bullying • District Policies
